seizure: m_c has recovered from their seizure.
m_c is up and moving again after resting from their seizure.
diarrhea: m_c has stopped constantly running to the dirtplace, it seems their brush with diarrhea has ended.
m_c is finally feeling better, their experience with diarrhea now over.
fleas: m_c has finally gotten rid of all their fleas.
m_c is free of fleas at last.
greencough: m_c is no longer coughing and sputtering, their case of greencough now cured.
kittencough: m_c is free of kittencough, once again able to play and frolick.
an infected wound: The infection in m_c's wound has abated.
m_c's wound is no longer infected.
redcough: Somehow, miraculously, m_c has recovered from redcough.
running nose: m_c's running nose has finally stopped running.
m_c no longer has a running nose.
a festering wound: m_c's wound is no longer festering, the infection is gone.
m_c's festering wound seems to have gotten a bit better.
heat stroke: m_c is no longer suffering from heat stroke.
m_c has recovered from heat stroke.
m_c is feeling much better, they've recovered from the heat stroke.
heat exhaustion: m_c has recovered from the heat exhaustion.
m_c managed to recover from their heat exhaustion.
stomachache: m_c is glad that their stomachache is finally gone.
m_c no longer has a stomachache.
constant nightmares: m_c's constant nightmares have finally calmed.
m_c was struggling with a recent flood of nightmares, but thankfully they seem to have stopped.
m_c is no longer having constant nightmares.
grief stricken: m_c will always feel their grief, but time has softened it, at least a little.
m_c gazes up into Silverpelt and finds that, finally, the grief has begun to lessen.
m_c wakes one day, after moons of numbness, and feels as though the world is less dull.
m_c tells themself that they can't let these feelings consume them, instead they have to learn to live with it.
m_c picks themself up out of their nest and begins the day anew, a fresh conviction in their heart.
malnourished: WARNING: this string should never appear, nutrition are handled only in freshkill events.
starving: WARNING: this string should never appear, nutrition are handled only in freshkill events.
anxiety attack: After a short while, m_c has calmed back down from their anxiety, no longer worrying about a threat that's not there.
m_c has spent the time talking with their clanmates and has realised that there's nothing to worry about.
Despite some lingering anxiety, m_c has calmed down and is able to feel secure in the knowledge that the clan is secure.
m_c feels much better after some rest and time spent watching the clan thrive.
panic attack: Despite still struggling a little bit m_c has mostly calmed down from their panic and feels able to take up their duties once more.
While their chest still races a bit as they leave the den, m_c is able to keep a clear head and rejoin their clanmates.
With the help of their clanmates m_c has steadied their breathing once more and feels ready to face the challenges of the day.
absence: m_c has come back to themselves after been absent.
Between blinks m_c stretches out, continuing on their day as normal.
spasms: Despite some lingering twitching m_c's recovered from their spasm.
m_c is able to get all of their paws underneath them without issues.
rat bite fever: Finally after moons of feeling touch and go the fever has left m_c's pelt and they feel better than ever.
Waking up m_c finally feels the relief of been in good health. No longer panting or whimpering, even the lingering rat bite seems to have healed.
m_c is so relieved to be able to get up out of the den and work once more. Even if that work is just clearing out their sickness scented bedding.
constipation: After longer than m_c would like to admit, their constipation has passed.
With relief m_c finds that their trips to the dirtplace will once more end in a timely manner.
ticks: m_c has finally gotten rid of all their ticks.
m_c is free of ticks at last.
seasonal lethargy: m_c wakes to the new dawn with a lightness in their chest and paws that has long been missed.
With the sounds of the songbirds in their ears m_c finds that the weight of fog over them has risen.
As m_c observes the first growth of the season they feel like a new cat.
m_c feels their tail swish with rekindled hope and trust in their own paws.
As the season changes the heavy weight in m_câ€™s bones begins to fade. Finally they feel like they can rise with the sun rather than wishing it would leave them to sleep.
lethargy: After some moons the weight that's been in m_c's limbs has lifted and they finally leave their nest feeling rejuvinated.
While still somewhat tired, m_c is able to greet the dawn with the swish of their tail and a flick of their ears.
m_c feels their tail swish with rekindled hope and trust in their own paws.
m_c is able to raise their sun and face the dawn with renewed energy.
They might always be a bit tired and wrung out but m_c finds that it's the small things that make the days brighter.
world tired: While they're still not back to normal m_c is able to feel much more together.
m_c thanks Starclan for the life they've been given and the chances they have to make it better.
m_c has gotten over their world tiredness.
After some long talks with their clanmates m_c has been reassured that they are loved and cared for.
m_c has found a hobby and something to remind them that the world isn't all bad things.
nonverbal: While cats are surprised to see m_c speaking again it is welcomed easily.
m_c cracks a joke at the gathering and makes some of the cats from the other clans laugh.
m_c chats with some of their denmates comfortable and at ease.
special interest: While the intensity of m_c's love for the subject has faded it's not gone in the least and they're still ready to chat off another cat's ears if prompted.
m_c's able to refocus themselves and stay on task, without always bringing their special interest into it.
m_c has some listlessness when their interest fades to slightly less all consuming.
m_c will always love their special interest, but can also make room for new interests.
hyperfixation: m_c is no longer hyperfixated on a topic.
m_c has returned to their regular daily activities.
stimming: For the moment, m_c has calmed their stimming.
m_c's stimming has become slightly less obvious.
After bouncing all around in their excitement m_c has calmed down.
m_c's stimming has calmed them back down.
m_c's finished self soothing with their stimming.
indecision: After a long period of deliberation m_c has made a decision.
m_c no longer feels trapped by indecision.
impulsivity: m_c has a clear head and is thinking through their decisions once more.
While still a bit twitchy and eager m_c has slowed down their decisions.
vivide daydreams: After all the daydreaming m_c feels once more able to engage with reality.
m_c is a lot more relaxed and feels able to focus completely on their tasks.
hallucinations: m_c is relieved when their head clears and they're no longer experiencing confusion or distress over what they see and hear.
zoomies: m_c has calmed back down from all their zooming around.
After all their zooming m_c has calmed down.
The clan is relieved to see m_c is calm and collected once more.
m_c is no longer zooming around the camp like a particularly young kitten.
compulsions: With some relief m_c finds that they're able to balance their compulasions throughout the day.
m_c has figured out a way to factor their compulsions more naturally into their routine.
m_c's been able to reorganize themselves and their compulsions.
turmoiled litter: With much relief m_c is feeling a bit more like themself.
m_c could almost cry as a weight they weren't fully conscious of seems to lift.
m_c purrs as their kittens roll around them, finally feeling like they can move on.
Sometimes a bond isn't instant and m_c finds that's alright.
sleeplessness: m_c is so relieved to just get a somewhat peaceful nights sleep once more.
Once more m_c is able to sleep. At least for now.
burn out: m_c is back on their paws after burn out.
m_c is no longer tired and exhausted from burn out.
